data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "In your opinion, which characteristic is more important in a friend: a sense of humor or reliability? Why? Give specific reasons for your answer."
data.answer: For a friend's traits, the most important characteristic is reliability. Compared with reliability, a sense of humor is relatively less crucial. This is because not all people require their friends to be humorous. Instead, all people build their friendships based on reliability. Friendship is a relationship from both sides, so people would never expect their friends to betray or abandon them. Even if people have a boring or a nerdy friend, as long as their values match, they would still be good friends. Thus, reliability weighs much more than being humorous for a friend's characteristic.
